historical:
Prior Codifications

2001 Ed., § 29-404.

1981 Ed., § 29-604.

1973 Ed., § 29-1104.

Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

Editor's Notes

Former § 29-504 has been recodified as § 36-504.

DC CODE § 29-504

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: This chapter shall not repeal, modify, or restrict the laws relating to corporations, or regulating the professions covered by this chapter, unless these laws conflict with this chapter.
Except as otherwise provided in this chapter, Chapter 3 of this title shall apply to a professional corporation organized under this chapter.

heading.catch_text: Construction; applicability of Chapter 3 of this title to corporations organized under chapter.
